name: Claude Enterprise Search
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's enterprise search knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's enterprise search knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5. Agents: claude-enterprise-search (ChatBot). Models: gpt-5.2. Images: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz. Skills: knowledge-synthesis, search-strategy, source-management. Rules: digest.md, search.md.
